verses.verse: Then the lot <S%H1486><s%> for the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Joseph <S%H3130><s%> went <S%H3318><s%> from the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> at Jericho <S%H3405><s%> to the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Jericho <S%H3405><s%> on the east <S%H4217><s%> into the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> going <S%H5927><s%> up from Jericho <S%H3405><s%> through the hill <S%H2022><s%> country <S%H2022><s%> to Bethel. <S%H1008><s%>
And it went <S%H3318><s%> from Bethel <S%H1008><s%> to Luz, <S%H3870><s%> and continued <S%H5674><s%> to the border <S%H1366><s%> of the Archites <S%H757><s%> at Ataroth. <S%H5852><s%>

And it went <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> westward <S%H3220><s%> to the territory <S%H1366><s%> of the Japhletites, <S%H3311><s%> as far <S%H5704><s%> as the territory <S%H1366><s%> of lower <S%H8481><s%> Beth-horon even to Gezer, <S%H1507><s%> and it ended <S%H1961><s%> <S%H8444><s%> at the sea. <S%H3220><s%>
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> and Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> received <S%H5157><s%> their inheritance. <S%H5157><s%>

Now [this] was the territory <S%H1366><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%> according to their families: <S%H4940><s%> the border <S%H1366><s%> of their inheritance <S%H5159><s%> eastward <S%H4217><s%> was Ataroth-addar, as far <S%H5704><s%> as upper <S%H5945><s%> Beth-horon.

Then the border <S%H1366><s%> went <S%H3318><s%> westward <S%H3220><s%> at Michmethath <S%H4366><s%> on the north, <S%H6828><s%> and the border <S%H1366><s%> turned <S%H5437><s%> about <S%H5437><s%> eastward <S%H4217><s%> to Taanath-shiloh, and continued <S%H5674><s%> [beyond] it to the east <S%H4217><s%> of Janoah. <S%H9192><s%>

And it went <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> from Janoah <S%H9192><s%> to Ataroth <S%H5852><s%> and to Naarah, <S%H5292><s%> then reached <S%H6293><s%> Jericho <S%H3405><s%> and came <S%H3318><s%> out at the Jordan. <S%H3383><s%>

From Tappuah <S%H8599><s%> the border <S%H1366><s%> continued <S%H1980><s%> westward <S%H3220><s%> to the brook <S%H5158><s%> of Kanah, <S%H7071><s%> and it ended <S%H1961><s%> <S%H8444><s%> at the sea. <S%H3220><s%> This <S%H2088><s%> is the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%> according to their families, <S%H4940><s%>

[together] with the cities <S%H5892><s%> which were set <S%H3995><s%> apart <S%H3995><s%> for the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages. <S%H9161><s%>

But they did not drive <S%H3423><s%> out the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> who lived <S%H3427><s%> in Gezer, <S%H1507><s%> so the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> live <S%H3427><s%> in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%> to this <S%H2088><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> and they became <S%H1961><s%> forced <S%H4522><s%> laborers. <S%H5647><s%> <S%H4522><s%>
